{{infobox shopping mall | | shopping_mall_name = SM Lifestyle Center | image = SM Supermalls Logo.png | image_width = 200px | location =[[Xiamen]], [[Fujian]], China | owner = [[SM Prime Holdings]] | floor_area = 109,947 sqm. |website = [http://www.smprime.com/smprime/index.php?p=671&mall=37 SM Prime Holdings]
[http://www.smcity.cn/lifestyle/ SM China]}} '''SM Lifestyle Center''' is the second shopping mall in [[Xiamen]], [[China]] after [[SM City Xiamen]] and it is also the 4th China mall expansion of SM Prime Holdings in the whole country with 216,000 m2 retail space. It is owned and operated by SM Prime Holdings, under the management of [[Henry Sy]], a [[Filipino-Chinese]] business tycoon. ==See also== *[[SM Prime Holdings]] *Other SM Malls in China **[[SM City Jinjiang]] **[[SM City Xiamen]] **[[SM City Chengdu]] {{SMPH}} {{Xiamen}} {{coord|24.5020424|118.1204215|display=t|type:landmark}} [[Category:Shopping malls in China]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Xiamen]] [[Category:SM Prime Holdings]]
